Rates - Class in unitConversion
Unit conversion rates following the metric system.
Rates() - Constructor for class unitConversion.Rates
 
refreshRateInHertz - Variable in class projectData.PhysicsSettings
Rate at which object positions and velocities are calculated.
registerPlanet(Planet) - Method in class planets.PlanetManager
Takes a Planet object and registers it to the simulation by creating a PlanetDisplay and adding the planet to lists that will be used for physics calculations and rendering.
removePlanetById(int) - Method in class planets.physics.physicsObjects.PlanetContainer
Removes the planet from the registry.
removePlanetById(int) - Method in class planets.PlanetManager
Marks the planet with this id as deleted, so that the render and physics engines will skip over it, and makes the PlanetDisplay invisible.
render() - Method in class planets.render.Renderer
Run this to update the positions and radii of PlanetDisplays.
render - Variable in class projectData.Settings
 
render - Variable in class ui.PropertiesPane
 
RenderDrawer - Class in ui.drawer
Drawer items allow the user to manipulate render settings.
RenderDrawer() - Constructor for class ui.drawer.RenderDrawer
 
renderer - Static variable in class bridge.Bridge
 
Renderer - Class in planets.render
In charge of drawing planets to the SimulationPane and updating their position at the request of the Scheduler.
Renderer() - Constructor for class planets.render.Renderer
 
RenderObjectsTest - Class in unitTests
Tests renderObjects for correctness.
